revised_title: Anatomy and Lymphatic Structure of the Thyroid Gland in Dogs
tldr: This study investigates the minute structure of the thyroid gland in dogs, focusing on the lymphatic system and its relationship to the gland's function. The researchers discovered a previously undescribed tissue and found that the lymphatic vessels and thyroid vesicles share morphological and staining similarities, suggesting a possible role in the formation of a material that enters the bloodstream.
